name: Get Some Fries
description:
(meme by Joshua Barkman)

What's the final goal of your entire life? Being successful in your career? Getting high-level education? Having a perfect marriage? Or maybe... Get some fries on the pier. We are that hardworking in our life, but what are we looking for? Maybe it's just for the fries on the pier.

In this game, you will play the seagull that is going to get some fries on the pier. Use droppings to poop on people and take their fries! Remember that never collect your fries before people disappear. Otherwise, they will hurt you.

Control:

  • WASD or ←↑↓→ = Move
  • Space = Shoot/Dropping
  • Reach Fries = Collect
